presets.name: SDXL Character Base
presets.description: Baseline SDXL character rendering without additional LoRAs.
presets.style_prompt: studio-lit character render, sharp line art, balanced colors
presets.negative_prompt: lowres, blurry, watermark, text, cropped, extra limbs, worst quality

presets.name: SDXL-Illustrated-Hero
presets.style_prompt: dramatic comic book illustration, bold inks, cinematic lighting
presets.negative_prompt: washed out colors, messy anatomy, text, watermark, low contrast

presets.name: SDXL Detail Offset
presets.description: Adds the official SDXL offset LoRA for crisp features and lighting.
presets.style_prompt: vibrant anime key art, clean cel shading, expressive pose
presets.negative_prompt: low detail, dull colors, watermark, signature, double face

presets.name: SDXL Pixel Character
presets.description: Pixel-art tuned LoRA for clean sprite-style characters.

presets.name: SDXL Anime Companion
presets.description: Anime companion styling LoRA for consistent manga/anime characters.

presets.name: Heroic Comics (Marvel)
presets.description: Punchy color palettes and dramatic shading inspired by Marvel comics.
presets.style_prompt: detailed mecha render, crisp plating, dramatic rim light
presets.negative_prompt: rubber surfaces, blurred joints, watermark, disjointed limbs

presets.name: Legendary Comics (DC)
presets.description: Strong silhouettes and high-contrast inks for a DC-inspired look.

presets.name: JRPG Hero (Final Fantasy)
presets.description: High-fantasy costuming and painterly lighting reminiscent of JRPG cinematics.

presets.name: Animated Feature Style
presets.description: Soft shading and expressive animation-friendly forms inspired by modern animated movies.
